Review Text: Bought for my son a few months ago and they have been working perfectly. Came with a charger and they charge pretty fast and charge actually lasts. Very easy to use and Bluetooth connection was easy. Audio is clear and microphone is good too. Has  volume control. Great value for the money!

Review Title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
These are awesome for Nintendo switch
Review Text: The headphones were shipped quickly! Packaging was  pleasant and came with the cord needed to charge. They are very comfy and the RBG lighting on them makes them look really cool. Considering what I paid for these I actually prefer them to more expensive headsets I have purchased in the past due to their duel functionality. I can put dongle right in my Nintendo switch dock when I’m playing on my monitor. When I want to play handheld the attachment on the dongle that goes directly into switch for portable use is AWESOME! They sound very clear and the mic seems to work well. I have asked about my voice quality with friends I game with and they said I sound super clear! I would buy again and I think I’m actually going to order a second pair for my kid! Super easy to set up. Super easy to connect!

These are one of the most comfortable headphones that I ever used. Not only does it not cause any discomfort when i wear it for prolonged periods of time, but it also helps to tune out and reduce background noised despite not being noise canceling. also i found that most headphones tend to be too big for my head size, however these perfectly fit. Also the mic is amazing I had used the mic in many different environments such as BF connection with my phone while on call, or usb connecting on my computer for conference call and even gaming, it works well in all environments. Lastly believe that it work better if not out perform in general compare to other headset costing $80 or more. So it general you are paying less and getting more for your money.

Review Title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Excellent Sound quality for music and voice.  Reliable iPhone bluetooth and MS Teams connection.
Review Text: So i was in the market for a new headset with the new USB-C iPhone.  I reviewed quite a few but i ultimately came across this product that claimed to support Bluetooth and 2.4GHz for laptop communication.  I needed both of these for personal and Teams conferences. Upon receiving the item i immediately tried the Bluetooth connection with the iPhone to test the quality of the connection, first with music from the phone and then a few phone calls.  I noticed immediately that with the Bluetooth phone connection, i was able to walk around the house, upstairs and downstairs, with walls in between, and still had a solid connection.  The bass was not muddy but solid and heavy like 30 Hz signal and the midrange and highs were reasonable considering it is Bluetooth.  The phone voice quality was very very good.  It was clear and well rounded as if the DtoA converter smoothed it out a bit with a slight dynamic expansion across the scectrum so that it sounds like i was using a studio mic.  This was the feedback i got from the folks i called. On the receiving end i could hear their voices with very good clarity.  I liked it so much so i called a few friends who are part of our weekly conference and share how much i liked the product.  Well a few days later they were also giving me feedback on how much they like the sound and the phone/Teams swich for personal and WFH tasks.  The quality of the build material is not the best, it does squeak a bit as you put it on, but the padding is great for at least 4 hours and the battery has lasted me more than 20 hours.  It can be USB-c charged while wearing it so this is not a big issue.  Only thing i would change about it is making headband material of a better quality for firmness so it does not squeak when putting it on.  Otherwize it is a very good buy.  I highly recommend this item.

Review Title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Box was not sealed - Nice Looking - Good deal
Review Text: Update: I have used this headset for a while and it’s decent and great for the price. I like the RGB lights on headset. Battery is pretty decent too. I have used it for gaming (no issues with audio output), clarity is fair enough. I have seen occasional delays during zoom meetings but works fine with teams meetings. It could be issue with my settings. I did like the usb-c option to connect which is convenient. It’s large for my ears but not heavy.So the only concern I had/ have will be the packing and quality itself.But for the price it’s a good deal. Changing my rating after using it for sometime.Customer sales support did reach out to help with issues but I did not face any technical issues yet.——————————————————————I haven’t used it yet, box was not sealed and the headphones were just wrapped in a bubble wrap and an obvios spelling mistake “paly” on the box makes me wonder if I should keep this.Wireless headset for under $30 is a good deal.Headset itself doesn’t seem of poor quality.

Review Title: Qu’il ne faut pas hésité mdr
Review Text: “Excellent rapport qualité/prix ! Ce casque gaming est vraiment impressionnant pour le prix. Le son est clair et immersif, avec des basses bien présentes qui renforcent l’expérience de jeu. Le micro capte bien la voix, ce qui est parfait pour les parties en ligne. Confortable même après plusieurs heures d’utilisation, il est léger et les coussinets sont doux. La qualité de fabrication est surprenante, avec une finition solide malgré son prix abordable. Si vous cherchez un bon casque gaming sans vous ruiner, c’est un choix sûr !”

I recently got my hands on these gaming headphones, and I must say, they are fantastic! The sound quality is top-notch, providing clear and immersive audio that enhances the gaming experience. The bass is deep, and the highs are crisp, making every game feel more realistic.The comfort level is also impressive. The ear cushions are soft and fit perfectly around the ears, allowing for long gaming sessions without any discomfort. The adjustable headband ensures a snug fit for any head size.Additionally, the microphone is clear and picks up voice commands without any issues, making communication with teammates seamless. The build quality feels sturdy and durable, which is great for daily use.Overall, these gaming headphones are a great investment for any gamer looking for high-quality audio and comfort. Highly recommended

Design und KomfortDas Design des OZEINO OW810 ist schlicht und funktional. Das Headset verfügt über einen robusten Kunststoffrahmen mit einer matten Oberfläche, die Fingerabdrücke und Kratzer minimiert. Die Ohrmuscheln sind mit weichem Kunstleder gepolstert, das für einen angenehmen Tragekomfort sorgt. Allerdings kann das Kunstleder bei längeren Nutzungssessions etwas warm werden. Der verstellbare Kopfbügel passt sich verschiedenen Kopfgrößen an und sorgt für einen sicheren Sitz, ohne zu drücken.KlangqualitätFür ein Headset in dieser Preisklasse liefert das OZEINO OW810 eine beeindruckende Klangqualität. Die 50-mm-Treiber bieten einen klaren und ausgewogenen Sound. Die Bässe sind ausreichend tief, während die Mitten und Höhen klar und deutlich wiedergegeben werden. Zwar fehlt es dem Headset an einem virtuellen Surround-Sound-Modus, dennoch ist die Stereotrennung gut genug, um in Spielen eine räumliche Wahrnehmung zu ermöglichen. Insgesamt bietet das OW810 eine zufriedenstellende Klangleistung für Spiele, Musik und Filme.MikrofonDas integrierte Mikrofon des OZEINO OW810 ist flexibel und lässt sich leicht in die gewünschte Position bringen. Es bietet eine ordentliche Sprachqualität und ist mit einer Rauschunterdrückungsfunktion ausgestattet, die Hintergrundgeräusche minimiert. Während das Mikrofon für die meisten Gaming-Anwendungen ausreichend ist, könnte die Sprachqualität für professionelle Aufnahmen oder Streaming etwas besser sein. Dennoch erfüllt es seinen Zweck in den meisten Spielsituationen.Konnektivität und KompatibilitätDas OZEINO OW810 ist mit einem 3,5-mm-Klinkenstecker ausgestattet, was es mit einer Vielzahl von Geräten kompatibel macht, einschließlich PCs, Konsolen (wie PlayStation und Xbox), sowie mobilen Geräten. Ein zusätzliches Y-Splitter-Kabel ist im Lieferumfang enthalten, um die getrennte Nutzung von Mikrofon und Kopfhörer auf Geräten mit separaten Anschlüssen zu ermöglichen. Diese einfache Plug-and-Play-Konnektivität macht das Headset benutzerfreundlich und vielseitig einsetzbar.Preis-Leistungs-VerhältnisDas herausragendste Merkmal des OZEINO OW810 ist sein hervorragendes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Für einen Bruchteil des Preises von High-End-Gaming-Headsets bietet es eine solide Leistung in den Bereichen Klangqualität, Komfort und Mikrofon. Es ist eine ideale Wahl für Gelegenheits- und Budget-Gamer, die ein zuverlässiges Headset suchen, ohne dabei tief in die Tasche greifen zu müssen.
